 Watch Jessica Vosk and Kelli Barrett Sing a Song From the Upcoming Broadway Musical Beaches

dtliExcerpt: Rachel McAdams gives a performance of such deep authenticity and emotional precision that she makes Amy Herzog's sometimes schematic play feel like lived experience.
